sen.j: 今上帝（きんじょうてい・きんじょうのみかど）は、『源氏物語』に登場する四番目の天皇（在位：「若菜 (源氏物語)下」～）。
sen.e: Emperor Kinjo or Kinjo no Mikado is the fourth Emperor in "The Tale of Genji" (the period of his reign: after the second volume of 'Wakana' (Spring Shoots).
Emperor Kinjo or Kinjo no Mikado is the fourth Emperor in "The Tale of Genji" (the period of his reign: after the second volume of 'Wakana' (Spring Shoots)).
Emperor Kinjo or Kinjo no Mikado is the fourth Emperor in "The Tale of Genji" (the period of his reign: after the second volume of 'Wakana' (Spring Shoots)).

sen.j: 架空の人物。
sen.e: A fictitious character.
A fictitious character.
A fictitious character.

sen.j: 朱雀帝の第一皇子で、母は承香殿女御（髭黒の姉妹。今上帝即位前に没、即位後皇太后を追贈）。
sen.e: He was the first prince of Emperor Suzaku, and his mother was Jokyoden no nyogo (The Lady of Jokyoden Palace) (a sister of Higekuro, who passed away before Kinjo no Mikado ascended to the throne, and after his enthronement, she was given a court rank of Empress Dowager).
sen.cmt: ２つに分かれていたセルを統合
sen.e: He was the first prince of Emperor Suzaku, and his mother was Jokyoden no nyogo (The Lady of Jokyoden Palace) (a sister of Higekuro, who passed away before Kinjo no Mikado ascended to the throne, and after his enthronement, she was given a court rank of Empress Dowager).

He was the first prince of Emperor Suzaku, and his mother was Jokyoden no nyogo (The Lady of Jokyoden Palace) (a sister of Higekuro, who passed away before Kinjo no Mikado ascended to the throne, and after his enthronement, she was given a court rank of Empress Dowager).

sen.j: 物語終了時をもって在位中の為、便宜的に今上帝と呼ばれることが多い。
sen.e: When the tale ends, he is still on the throne, therefore he is often called Kinjo no Mikado for convenience.
When the tale ends, he is still on the throne, therefore he is often called Kinjo no Mikado for convenience.
When the tale ends, he is still on the throne, therefore he is often called Kinjo no Mikado for convenience.

sen.j: 明石の姫君…光源氏（六条院）の娘。
sen.e: Young lady Akashi --- the daughter of Hikaru Genji (Rokujo-in).
Young lady Akashi --- the daughter of Hikaru Genji (Rokujo-in).
Young lady Akashi --- the daughter of Hikaru Genji (Rokujo-in).

sen.j: 東宮、二の宮、匂宮、五の宮、女一宮の母。
sen.e: She was the mother of Togu (Crown Prince), Nino Miya, Nioumiya, Gono Miya, and Onnna Ichinomiya.
She was the mother of Togu (Crown Prince), Nino Miya, Nioumiya, Gono Miya, and Onnna Ichinomiya.
She was the mother of Togu (Crown Prince), Nino Miya, Nioumiya, Gono Miya, and Onna Ichinomiya.

sen.j: 飛香舎女御…左大臣の娘。
sen.e: Higyosha no nyogo --- a daughter of Sadaijin (Minister of the Left).
Higyosha no nyogo --- a daughter of Sadaijin (Minister of the Left).
Higyosha no nyogo --- a daughter of Sadaijin (Minister of the Left).

sen.j: 女二宮の母。
sen.e: The mother of Onna Ninomiya.
The mother of Onna Ninomiya.
The mother of Onna Ninomiya.

sen.j: 「梅枝」の麗景殿女御と同一人物か。
sen.e: She might be identified with Reikeiden no nyogo (Lady Reikeiden) in the chapter of 'Umegae' (The Plum Tree Branch).
She might be identified with Reikeiden no nyogo (Lady Reikeiden) in the chapter of 'Umegae' (The Plum Tree Branch).
She might be identified with Reikeiden no nyogo (Lady Reikeiden) in the chapter of 'Umegae' (The Plum Tree Branch).

sen.j: 某更衣…常陸宮の母。
sen.e: Nanigashi no Koi (a certain lady in waiting in the court) --- the mother of Hitachi no Miya.
Nanigashi no Koi (a certain lady in waiting in the court) --- the mother of Hitachi no Miya.
Nanigashi no Koi (a certain lady in waiting in the court) --- the mother of Hitachi no Miya.

sen.j: 尚侍（内裏の君）…髭黒の三女。
sen.e: Naishi no Kami (Principal Handmaid) (Dairi no Kimi) --- the third daughter of Higekuro.
Naishi no Kami (Principal Handmaid) (Dairi no Kimi) --- the third daughter of Higekuro.
Naishi no Kami (Principal Handmaid) (Dairi no Kimi) --- the third daughter of Higekuro.

sen.j: 母は玉鬘 (源氏物語)。
sen.e: Her mother was Tamakazura.
sen.cmt: （源氏物語）はリンク先の語のため、訳出しませんでした。
sen.e: Her mother was Tamakazura.
Her mother was Tamakazura.

sen.j: 「竹河」のみに登場。
sen.e: She appears only in the chapter of 'Takekawa' (Bamboo River).
She appears only in the chapter of 'Takekawa' (Bamboo River).
She appears only in the chapter of 'Takekawa' (Bamboo River).

sen.j: 第一皇子：東宮

sen.j: 女御：夕霧 (源氏物語)長女、紅梅 (源氏物語)長女（麗景殿）
sen.e: Nyogo (a consort of an emperor): the oldest daughter of Yugiri, and the oldest daughter of Kobai (Reikeiden)
